Title: Yume Miteru Wake ja Nai yo
Description: ['Music video for the song ', Yume Miteru Wake ja Nai yo, " by Hiromine Takano and the NHK Tokyo Children's Choir (NHK Tokyo Jidou Gasshoudan) that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Yasuhiko Suzuki."]
Related: ['Prequel: Zhiqu Yang Xuetang: Yundong Pian', 'Sequel: Zhiqu Yang Xuetang: Yangyang You Shijie']
